We noticed on an old invoice that the landscape company we used in 2014 had  used Cedar Shade to build our front yard pergola. The quality of that pergola is outstanding, therefore in 2025 we decided to contact Cedar Shade directly to have … More

Excellent job by Phil and his crew! The plans that he put together were top notch which made it easy to get approved by the HOA. The quality of work is great and pricing is very reasonable. I definitely recommend them!

Cedar Shade did an excellent job on our back porch. We had tongue in groove added underneath to an existing roof that Cedar Shade had built a few years ago. Jacob, Rueben, and John were very polite and professional and very easy to work … More
